Package src.views.listeners

Interface ThemeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Board, Cell, CenterPanelTopBar, ChoosePlayers, CustomizedButton, CustomizedTextField, ExitButton, Field, GameBoard, GameOverDialog, GoBackButton, HintButton, HistoryButton, LeftPanelTopBar, LoadPage, MainMenu, ManualButton, MovesHistory, MusicButton, PauseButton, PauseDialogContent, PauseMenuButton, Pawn, PawnsBarSlot, RedoButton, ResumeButton, RightPanelTopBar, SavePage, ThemeButton, TopBarMainMenu, UndoButton
public interface ThemeListener
An interface for objects that listen for changes in the application's theme and need to update accordingly.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updatedTheme()
    Method to notify listeners when the theme is updated.
